title: Sign up for a Costco Executive Gold Star Membership and get a free $40 gift card
description: Save on groceries, electronics, and more with Costco's top-tier membership, which gets you 2% back on your purchases and lower prices on Costco services.

title: Best of CES 2024: Editors' picks for top buys and the products of the future
description: Of everything we saw at CES 2024, we picked a TV, a laptop, an AI device, and a tech accessory we most recommend. And we have picks for the most innovative stuff, too.

title: This Apple TV 4K remote alternative is just $27
description: Controlling your Apple TV is a breeze when your remote has well-placed, functional buttons.

title: How ChatGPT turns something creepy into something cleverly creepy
description: Well, AI has gone to the dogs. Here's a use of ChatGPT I'd never considered.

title: Buy a one-year Costco membership for just $40
description: If you purchase a Costco membership for $60 right now, you'll get a $20 gift card to use in the store or online with this deal, to save on everything from groceries to electronics.

title: Create an e-book using AI for just $25
description: Using ChatGPT,  My AI eBook Creation Pro helps you write an entire e-book with just three clicks -- no writing or technical experience required.

title: The best laptops of CES 2024
description: CES 2024 has been chock-full of AI integration, and this year's laptop lineup is no different. Brands like MSI, HP, and Razer are utilizing AI in their CPUs for better multitasking and efficiency.
